articles.description: A TikTok user shared the Waffle House they made on Starfield's ruined Earth using the game's outpost building tools.
articles.content:
A TikTok user shared the Waffle House they made on Starfields ruined Earth using the games Outpost building tools.

articles.author: Kurt Knutsson, CyberGuy Report
articles.title: Best alternatives to ChatGPT - Fox News
articles.description: While ChatGPT has grown to be a go-to in the Open Ai circuit, there are a number of AI alternatives such as Bard, Microsoft's Bing Chat and Google's Socratic.
articles.content: Im still amazed at how ChatGPT can help write a toast to put people in stitches at a wedding, construct a legal argument to bolster a case and even help with a college admissions essay despite the nu… [+7711 chars]
